org.efaps.db.print

Class Phrase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.db.print.Phrase

  • public class Phrase
extends Object
    Class is used as a wraper for a series of OneSelects as part of one phrase.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team
